name: Savestate2Snes
short-description: A tool to manage savestates for differents systems: FxPak Pros, Snes Classic and NWA emulators
description:
A tool to manage savestates for differents systems.
    -FxPak Pro using usb2snes capable firmware
    -Snes Classic hacked with Hakchi2CE and with the serverstuff mod installed
    -NWA capable emulators
